verbs.description: [ARG1: A story] [V: circulating] [ARGM-LOC: on social media] falsely claims President Donald Trump has removed a Muslim federal judge for trying to implement Sharia law in the United States .
[ARG0: A story circulating on social media] [ARGM-MNR: falsely] [V: claims] [ARG1: President Donald Trump has removed a Muslim federal judge for trying to implement Sharia law in the United States] .
A story circulating on social media falsely claims President Donald Trump [V: has] removed a Muslim federal judge for trying to implement Sharia law in the United States .
A story circulating on social media falsely claims [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: removed] [ARG1: a Muslim federal judge] [ARG2: for trying to implement Sharia law in the United States] .
A story circulating on social media falsely claims President Donald Trump has removed [ARG0: a Muslim federal judge] for [V: trying] [ARG1: to implement Sharia law in the United States] .
A story circulating on social media falsely claims President Donald Trump has removed [ARG0: a Muslim federal judge] for trying to [V: implement] [ARG1: Sharia law] [ARGM-LOC: in the United States] .
